text: Sperchontidae is a family of prostigs in the order Trombidiformes. There are at least 3 genera and about 19 described species in Sperchontidae. ==Genera== * Apeltosperchon * Sperchon Kramer, 1877 * Sperchonopsis Piersig, 1896 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Trombidiformes
title: Sperchontidae
